page.title: 15CHURCH DUNLOP
page.content: THE PRESENT CHURCH BUILDING IS 150 YEARS OLD. THERE HAS BEEN A CHURCH IN DUNLOP FOR 900 YEARS. THE CHURCH WAS DEMOLISHED AND REBUILT IN 1642. DUNLOP KIRK IS WELL KNOWN FOR ITS WINDOWS ALL OF WHICH HAVE BEEN DONATED BY FAMILIES CONNECTED WITH DUNLOP.THE WILSON WINDOW AND GARDEN WERE DONATED IN 1968 BY MR. WILSON OF THORNTONHALL.THE WINDOW DEPICTS THE EVOLUTION OF THE WORLD AND ALL IS HELD TOGETHER BY THE CROSS OF SACRIFICE. AT NIGHT THE WINDOW IS ILLUMINATED FROM WITHIN WHEN THE EFFECT, AS SEEN FROM THE VILLAGE STREET, IS ARRESTING. THE MOST EYE CATCHING THING OUTSIDE THE CHURCH IS THE HANS HAMILTON TOMB. MR.CURRIE;A WELL KNOWN BROADCASTER AND TRAVELLER;IS THE PRESENT MINISTER OF DUNLOP AND HAS BEEN FOR THE PAST 13 YEARS.
